name: Boss Rush (MrMaxico)
description:
You are a small little robot  hardcoded to exterminate all threats in the world.

Do you have what it takes to beat all 4 bosses?

[known issues]

-hard mode already being unlocked, it's supposed to be unlocked when finishing the game.

-sprites sometimes appearing in places where they shouldn't be.

this game was ported from GM 8 and has since then been a buggy mess. sorry about that!

[DISCLAIMER!]

I don't own any of the music and sounds in this game, all credit goes to the original artists.
